sentences.en: A : Verify that you have the correct muffler system.
sentences.cn: 核实,您有正确消音器系统.

sentences.en: A suction line muffler should be package protected.
sentences.cn: 抽吸管路的消音器需要包装保护.

sentences.en: Entering the banquet hall you should take off your overcoat, hat, the muffler and glove.
sentences.cn: 进入宴会厅应脱大衣 、 脱帽 、 脱围巾和手套.

sentences.en: Haynes then went on to invent the muffler and different metal alloys.
sentences.cn: 然后,海恩斯接着又发明了消音器及各种不同的金属合金.

sentences.en: He moved to Bogotá, where he lived with relatives and worked in an auto muffler shop.
sentences.cn: 随后，他搬到波哥达，与亲戚住在一起，并在一家汽车消声器商店工作。

sentences.en: He wore a silk muffler and gloves.
sentences.cn: 他还围一条丝围巾,戴着手套.

sentences.en: It bounced up under the car and tore off the muffler of my ancient Ford station wagon.
sentences.cn: 那锥标弹了起来，扯下了我那台老式的福特旅行车的消音器。

sentences.en: It had a split in the muffler.
sentences.cn: 它后面的消音器已有一条裂缝.

sentences.en: Keywords: acoustics, muffler , transfer matrix, plane wave.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 声音 、 消音器、传输矩阵 、 平面波.

sentences.en: Next I tried working in a muffler factory, but that was exhausting.
sentences.cn: 接着我到排气管厂工作, 提起来实在令人泄气.

sentences.en: Plastic muffler or big bath towel to put at the front chest.
sentences.cn: 将塑胶围巾或大毛巾置于胸前.

sentences.en: The engine exhausts through the muffler.
The last glance of the viewers lies on the Abt rear muffler with its four pipes.
sentences.cn: 在观众的最后一眼是在阿伯特其四管后消音器.

sentences.en: This method is effective to control muffler attenuation of the muffler structure which is Axis symmetry.
sentences.cn: 这一方法对控制以轴向尺寸为主的消声结构的消声低谷非常有效.
哇, 好棒的一条围巾.

words.tran_cn: 低沉的声音；消声器；包裹物（如头巾，围巾等）；唇鼻部
蒙住；裹住；抑制；发低沉的声音
围巾；[声]消音器；面纱；厚手套

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment on a vehicle that makes the noise from the engine quieter
